code: class PhotoApi{constructor(config){this._url=void 0;this._headers=void 0;this._url=config.url;this._headers=config.headers;}_checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject('An error has occurred');}searchPhoto(keyword){return fetch("".concat(this._url,"search?query=").concat(keyword,"&per_page=80"),{method:'GET',headers:this._headers}).then(this._checkResponse);}fetchStartPhotos(){return fetch("".concat(this._url,"curated?per_page=13"),{method:'GET',headers:this._headers}).then(this._checkResponse);}}const photoApi=new PhotoApi({url:'https://api.pexels.com/v1/',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Accept:'application/json',Authorization:'zq95MtbKLDwXRldJIq1QXrV0hhR99pfSwHVkWZiQO6byYJyvH1OYv77Q'}});export default photoApi;
